video.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
video.synopsis: Sonic the Hedgehog leads a group of freedom fighters against the evil Dr. Robotnik, who's reduced planet Mobius to a breeding ground for corruption.

episodes.synopsis: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's air base in a mission to reprogram the launch data on Robotnik's fleet of Stealth-Bot aircraft.
episodes.title: Sonic Boom

episodes.synopsis: During a mission to one of Robotnik's factories, Sally is taken prisoner by Robotnik and Snively, who construct a robotisized "Sally" clone.
episodes.title: Sonic and Sally

episodes.synopsis: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's lab in hopes of deciphering his Robotisizer system.
episodes.title: Ultra Sonic

episodes.synopsis: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters seek out the "secret scrolls" that have great powers they hope to use in their struggle with Robotnik.
episodes.title: Sonic and the Secret Scrolls

episodes.synopsis: While on a mission to the big city to replace Nicole's malfunctioning microchip, Sonic and Sally encounter the Guardian.
episodes.title: Super Sonic

episodes.synopsis: Sonic is lured into an obvious trap when a frustrated Robotnik decides to appeal to the Hedgehog's ego and announces a race.
episodes.title: Sonic Racer

episodes.synopsis: Sonic conquers Robotnik's latest evil: a vehicle designed to locate and destroy living tissue matter during a solo mission to the Badlands.
episodes.title: Hooked on Sonics

episodes.synopsis: When Robotnik launches a spy orb, Sonic and Robot launch themselves up to the orbiting spy sphere aboard a homemade rocket.
episodes.title: Harmonic Sonic

episodes.synopsis: When Sally uncovers Robotnik's plan to seed the clouds with toxic rain, they attempt a daring mission to sabotage the dirigible-like craft.
episodes.title: Sonic's Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: When Sonic and the Freedom Fighters take out Robotnik's main computer, they're trapped by Swat-Bots in an underground tunnel.
episodes.title: Warp Sonic

episodes.synopsis: Robotnik severely upsets the ecosystem above and below the surface when he sends explosive Robotnik snake probes to drill in search of oil.
episodes.title: Sub-Sonic

episodes.synopsis: Tails brings a new friend home to Knothole: a baby Terra-Pod that has strayed from the herd that is currently migrating.
episodes.title: Sonic Past Cool

episodes.synopsis: Sonic reluctantly takes Tails with him to the Big City to find some cotter pins for the Freedom Fighters catapults.
episodes.title: Heads or Tails

episodes.synopsis: The Freedom Fighters, with new addition Dulcy, develop a Derobotisizer and try it out on Bunnie.
episodes.title: Sonic Conversion

episodes.synopsis: The Freedom Fighters meet a Swashbuckler named Ari battling Swat-Bots. Sonic helps Ari escape, but there's something about him Sally doesn't trust.
episodes.title: Game Guy

episodes.synopsis: Sonic attempts a solo rescue to prevent prisoners from being robotisized and is hit by a Memory Scrambler that erases short-term memory.
episodes.title: No Brainer

episodes.synopsis: After a disastrous mission, Sonic laments that they can't go back and prevent Robotnik's take-over.
episodes.title: Blast to the Past: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sonic and Sally steal the Roboti-sizer plans, stop the Destroyer from polluting the Great Forest, and save Little Sonic, Little Sally and Sabina.
episodes.title: Blast to the Past: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Antoine decides to study martial arts, but after he wrecks most of Knothole, Sonic sends him off to practice in the woods.
episodes.title: Fed Up With Antoine / Ghost Busted

episodes.synopsis: Tails begins his training to become a real Freedom Fighter by learning tracking skills while on a camping trip with Sonic and Antoine.
episodes.title: Dulcy

episodes.synopsis: After Dulcy exhibits strange behavior, Sally discovers she's going through a "rites of passage" stage of her adolescence.
episodes.title: The Void

episodes.synopsis: After Sonic is almost sucked inside the Void, he finds a huge ring that Sally believes is an ancient relic but turns out to be a sorcerer's trick.
episodes.title: The Odd Couple / Ro-Becca

episodes.synopsis: When a blizzard hits Knothole, causing Dulcy to demolish a few huts during a landing, Sonic is forced to bunk with Antoine.
episodes.title: Cry of the Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Rotor puts the finishing touches on his new robot assistant, but soon has to leave. Antoine accidentally activates her and it's love at first sight.
episodes.title: Drood Henge

episodes.synopsis: On a mission to contact the first Freedom Fighters, Sonic and the others travel through a tunnel that carries a curse against intruders.
episodes.title: Spyhog

episodes.synopsis: When Uncle Chuck's "bug" reveals Robotnik's search for the Deep Power Stones, he informs Sally, who investigates the Royal Family Secret.
episodes.title: The Doomsday Project
